headline: AEP Names Industry Veteran Doug Cannon President of AEP Transmission
summary: American Electric Power (Nasdaq: AEP) has named Douglas A. Cannon president of AEP Transmission, effective June 11. Cannon will report to Bill Fehrman, AEP president and chief executive officer.
